page_title: real world example prodigys own documentation
quality_assessment: Page has significant drift - documents mdBook workflow but is in MkDocs docs. Should document the MkDocs workflow instead.

issues.description: Page documents mdBook workflow (book-docs-drift.yml) but is located in MkDocs documentation. Should document mkdocs-drift.yml workflow instead.
issues.current_content: References book/src/, book-docs-drift.yml, book-config.json, prodigy-chapters.json for mdBook
issues.should_be: References docs/, mkdocs-drift.yml, mkdocs-config.json, mkdocs-chapters.json for MkDocs
issues.fix_suggestion: Rewrite entire page to document the MkDocs workflow (workflows/mkdocs-drift.yml) and MkDocs configuration (.prodigy/mkdocs-config.json)

issues.description: Shows .prodigy/book-config.json but MkDocs uses .prodigy/mkdocs-config.json with different structure
issues.should_be: docs_dir, mkdocs_config, theme, features, plugins, markdown_extensions fields
issues.fix_suggestion: Replace with mkdocs-config.json content showing docs_dir, theme, features, plugins, markdown_extensions

issues.description: Shows workflows/data/prodigy-chapters.json but MkDocs uses workflows/data/mkdocs-chapters.json
issues.fix_suggestion: Replace with mkdocs-chapters.json content and update paths

issues.description: Shows book-docs-drift.yml but should show mkdocs-drift.yml
issues.current_content: References book-docs-drift.yml with book-specific commands like /prodigy-analyze-subsection-drift
issues.should_be: References mkdocs-drift.yml with MkDocs-specific commands like /prodigy-analyze-mkdocs-drift
issues.fix_suggestion: Replace with mkdocs-drift.yml content showing MkDocs-specific commands

issues.description: Missing documentation for MkDocs Material features used by the workflow
issues.fix_suggestion: Add section explaining MkDocs Material features (admonitions, tabs, code annotations) and how the workflow enhances pages with them

issues.description: Missing documentation for the /prodigy-enhance-mkdocs-page command that adds visual features
issues.fix_suggestion: Add section explaining how the workflow enhances pages with diagrams, admonitions, and code annotations

issues.description: Missing documentation for Mermaid diagram validation in reduce phase
issues.fix_suggestion: Add section explaining Mermaid validation with mermaid-sonar and /prodigy-fix-mermaid-diagrams

issues.description: Missing documentation for the auto-discovery feature that finds all markdown files
issues.fix_suggestion: Add section explaining how the workflow auto-discovers all .md files in docs/ directory
Update all file references to MkDocs equivalents

issues.description: Source references point to book files with incorrect line numbers
issues.should_be: References should point to MkDocs files with correct line numbers
issues.fix_suggestion: Update source references to MkDocs files

positive_aspects: Clear explanation of MapReduce parallelism concept
Good coverage of validation with thresholds pattern
Well-structured breakdown of workflow phases (setup, map, reduce)
Error handling with DLQ concept explained clearly
improvement_suggestions: Rewrite page to document MkDocs workflow instead of mdBook workflow
Add section on MkDocs Material features and extensions
Document the auto-discovery mechanism for finding all markdown files
Add section on visual enhancement phase (admonitions, tabs, diagrams)
Update all file paths and source references to MkDocs equivalents
Include links to MkDocs Material documentation for extensions

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
